metadata.title: CVE-2023-52529 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: HID:sony: Fix a potential memory leak in sony_probe() If an error occurs aftera successful usb_alloc_urb() call, usb_free_urb() should be called.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
